msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I don't believe it! Did YOU put here?<20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />I love it! It's so !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />!Isis that edible? I mean, I can even SMELL mushrooms.<20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" /> But maybe it's just been there awhile.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? In ?<20_2 arg="3" />Why not, as long as it looks cool?<10_4 /><20_3 arg="6" /> Looks cool! Get it, ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I get a cool, mellow-out vibe whenever I get near .<20_2 arg="3" />Reminds me of my grandma's house. She lived waaay out in the middle of nowhere. <20_2 arg="6" />I miss that place.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I can't take it anymore! Havin' around just makes me nervous!<20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />I just always feel like I'm gonna knock it over, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?<20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />Do you think it's gonna be alright where it is, ? It looks really old!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What's this? Is someone trying to set up an outdoor school here or something, ?<20_2 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Well, you can't teach an old new tricks, so count me out!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Well, we're already on an island. May as well make it a fancy, resort-y one, ! Bwa ha ha!<20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />Hey! I say whoever put here, keep 'em coming!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Who do you think put out here, ?<20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />I get wanting to feel the breeze while you work, buthow much work are they expecting to actually do here?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Think if you leave log furniture out here long enough, <20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />it'll turn back into a tree, ?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? Yeah, I don't knowI mean, it's definitely cute, <20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />but it's just not my style, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I can't help it. Whenever I see I just wanna take a bite!<20_2 arg="3" /><20_2 arg="6" />Hey, I know it's not real! But it looks so juicy, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! That rocks!<20_2 arg="3" />The big colors, the retro vibe Yeah, this is awesome, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I can't tell you how much seeing
boosts my day!<20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />One glance and it hits me all over again just how much FUN I'm having on , !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is this made of real shells? 'Cause I don't wanna break it, but<20_2 arg="3" />I also keep bumping into it, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, wow! That is a classy ! Nice!<20_2 arg="3" />I love how warm the wood feels, and yet the metal gives it a cool modern vibe, .<20_2 arg="6" />I, uhsaw that in a magazine. I'm not THAT up on furniture!
